Speakers can be imported into SayIt if they are available in Popolo JSON format.

Enter the location of the speaker data as either

  • A URL, or path to a local file, containing Popolo JSON in the format 
    {
    'persons': [<a list of persons>],
    'organizations': [],
    'posts': [],
    ...
}
  • A URL, or path to a local file, containing Popolo JSON in the format 
    [<a list of persons>]
  • A PopIt API base url, such as https://kenyan-politicians.popit.mysociety.org/api/v0.1/
